text: fiscal committee membership amend rsa i to read as follows there is hereby established a fiscal committee of the general court said committee shall consist of members five shall be members of the house as follows the chairperson of the finance committee and other members of the committee appointed by the chairperson and other house members appointed by the speaker of the house members appointed by the speaker of the house and members appointed by the house minority leader five members shall be members of the senate as follows the chairperson of the finance committee and other members of that committee appointed by the chairperson and other senators appointed by the senate president members appointed by the president of the senate and members appointed by the senate minority leader the chairperson of the house finance committee shall be the chairperson of the fiscal committee
